Name: Bringadi Royal Hair Elixir
Short description: Nourishing Ayurvedic hair oil for stronger roots and shine.
Description: A luxurious blend of Bhringraj, Amla, Brahmi, and Sesame Oil. Helps reduce breakage, supports scalp comfort, and restores natural luster. Ideal for weekly pre-wash rituals.

Name: Amla Revival Scalp Therapy Oil
Short description: Targeted scalp treatment for dry and flaky scalp.
Description: Infused with Amla, Neem, and Fenugreek extracts. Promotes healthy scalp balance and supports fuller-feeling hair with consistent use.

Name: Saffron Radiance Face Serum
Short description: Glow-boosting serum with saffron and kumkumadi-inspired botanicals.
Description: A lightweight elixir featuring saffron, licorice, and rosehip oils to visibly brighten dull skin and support even tone. Suitable for PM rituals.

Name: Multani Mitti Detox Mask
Short description: Classic clay mask for deep cleansing and oil control.
Description: Premium Multani Mitti blended with sandalwood and tulsi extracts. Draws out excess oil, refines pores, and leaves skin refreshed.

Name: Rose & Vetiver Hydra Mist
Short description: Hydrating facial mist for instant skin comfort.
Description: Crafted with rose water, vetiver, and aloe vera for quick hydration and soothed feel across seasons.

Name: Ubtan Polishing Body Scrub
Description: A gentle body polish with chickpea flour, turmeric, and almond powder to reveal softer, brighter-looking skin.

Name: Sandalwood Body Butter
Short description: Rich daily moisturizer with warm sandalwood notes.
Description: Deeply nourishing body butter powered by shea, cocoa butter, and sandalwood extract for long-lasting softness.

Name: Kesar Lip Ritual Balm
Short description: Everyday lip balm with saffron and ghee-inspired nourishment.
Description: Softens dry lips with kokum butter, saffron extract, and vitamin E. Non-sticky comfort with natural sheen.

Name: Rose Tint Lip Elixir
Short description: Hydrating lip tint in a soft rose tone.
Description: A buildable rose tint with pomegranate and beetroot pigments for subtle color and moisture.

Name: Radiance Ritual Gift Box
Short description: Curated face ritual gift set with premium packaging.
Description: Includes Saffron Radiance Serum, Hydra Mist, and Kesar Lip Balm in an elegant box with gift-message option.

Name: Hair Revival Gift Duo
Short description: Power duo for scalp and strand nourishment.
Description: Combines Bringadi Royal Hair Elixir and Amla Scalp Therapy in a festive gift box. Ideal for wellness gifting.

Name: Kumkumadi Night Repair Oil
Short description: Night ritual facial oil for luminous morning skin.
Description: Inspired by classical kumkumadi traditions, this overnight oil combines saffron, manjistha, and licorice for a rested glow.
